exceptions.exn: In environment A : lattice s : chain tp x : A H : forall y : A, y \\In s -> y <== x Unable to unify "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class ?M1468) in mx_leq) (lim ?M1469) ?M1470" with "(let (mx_leq, _, _, _) := Poset.mixin (Poset.class tp) in mx_leq) (lat_lim s) x".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: lattice
s: chain tp
x: Poset.sort tp

Goal:
(forall y : A, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lat_lim s <== x

Premises:
Notation tp := (Lattice.poset A)
Record chain (T : poset) : Type := Chain { pred_of : Pred T; _ : chain_axiom pred_of } Arguments Chain [T pred_of]
Notation lattice := Lattice.type
lat_lim = fun s : chain tp => sup s : chain tp -> A
limM : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), (forall y : D, y \In s -> y <== x) -> lim s <== x
CPOMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_bot : T) (mx_lim : chain T -> T), (forall x : T, mx_bot <== x) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s) -> (forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x) -> CPO.mixin_of T
fun_limM : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), (forall y : [posetofA -> B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> fun_lim s <== x
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
pair_limM : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), (forall y : [posetofA * B], y \In s -> y <== x) -> pair_lim s <== x
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_bot : Poset.sort T; mx_lim : chain T -> T; _ : forall x : T, mx_bot <== x; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_lim s; _ : forall (s : chain T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_lim s <== x } Arguments CPO.Mixin [T mx_bot] [mx_lim]%function_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
infM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred_Class) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y) -> x <== inf s
dfun_limM : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> cpo) (s : chain (dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x))) (x : dfunPoset (fun x : A => B x)), (forall y : dfunPoset (fun x0 : A => B x0), y \In s -> y <== x) -> dfun_lim s <== x
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
lat_limP : forall (s : chain tp) (x : A), x \In s -> x <== lat_lim s
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [A : lattice s : chain tp x : A |- Type] ?T' : [A : lattice s : chain tp x : A |- Type] ?f : [A : lattice s : chain tp x : A |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [A : lattice s : chain tp x : A |- ?T'] ?s : [A : lattice s : chain tp x : A |- seq ?T]
sub_supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (C : sup_closed s) (u : Pred (subPoset s)) (x : subPoset s), (forall y : subPoset s, y \In u -> y <== x) -> sub_sup C u <== x
poset_asym : forall (T : poset) (x y : T), x <== y -> y <== x -> x = y
PosetMixin : forall (T : Type) (mx_leq : T -> T -> Prop), (forall x : T, mx_leq x x) -> (forall x y : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y x -> x = y) -> (forall x y z : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y z -> mx_leq x z) -> Poset.mixin_of T
dfun_asym : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> poset) (x : forall x : A, B x) (y : forall x0 : A, B x0), dfun_leq x y -> dfun_leq y x -> x = y
prop_limM : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), (forall q : [posetofProp], q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_lim s <== p
poset_trans : forall (T : poset) (y x z : T), x <== y -> y <== z -> x <== z
dfun_trans : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> poset) (x : forall x : A, B x) (y z : forall x0 : A, B x0), dfun_leq x y -> dfun_leq y z -> dfun_leq x z
prop_supM : forall (s : Pred Prop) (p : propPoset), (forall q : Prop, q \In s -> q <== p) -> prop_sup s <== p
dfun_leq : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> poset), (forall x : A, B x) -> (forall x : A, B x) -> Prop
InE : forall T : Type, (forall x y : T, x \In [:: y] <-> x = y) * (forall (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s <-> x = y \/ x \In s) * (forall (T0 : Type) (x : T0) (p : Simpl_Pred T0), (x \In p) = p x)
fun_supM : forall (A : Type) (B : lattice) (s : Pred (A -> B)) (p : A -> B), (forall q : A -> B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> fun_sup s <== p
prop_limP : forall (s : chain [posetofProp]) (p : [posetofProp]), p \In s -> p <== prop_lim s
sup_appE : forall (A : Type) (B : lattice) (s : Pred (A -> B)) (x : A), sup s x = sup [Pred y | exists f : A -> B, f \In s /\ y = f x]
ideal_supM : forall (T : lattice) (P : T) (s : Pred (ideal P)) (p : idealPoset P), (forall q : ideal P, q \In s -> q <== p) -> ideal_sup s <== p
fun_limP : forall (A : Type) (B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA -> B]) (x : [posetofA -> B]), x \In s -> x <== fun_lim s
fun_asym : forall (A : Type) (B : poset) (x y : A -> B), fun_leq x y -> fun_leq y x -> x = y
limP : forall (D : cpo) (s : chain D) (x : D), x \In s -> x <== lim s
pair_supM : forall (A B : lattice) (s : Pred (A * B)) (p : A * B), (forall q : A * B, q \In s -> q <== p) -> pair_sup s <== p
In_cons : forall (T : Type) (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s < -> x = y \/ x \In s
ideal_asym : forall (T : poset) (P : T) (x y : ideal P), ideal_leq x y -> ideal_leq y x -> x = y
pair_asym : forall (A B : poset) (x y : A * B), pair_leq x y -> pair_leq y x -> x = y
dapp_mono : forall x0 : ?A, monotone (@^~ x0) where ?A : [A : lattice s : chain tp x : A |- Type] ?T : [A : lattice s : chain tp x : A |- ?A -> poset]
sup_dappE : forall (A : Type) (B : A -> lattice) (s : Pred (dfunLattice B)) (x : A), sup s x = sup [Pred y | exists f : dfunLattice B, f \In s /\ y = f x]
fun_trans : forall (A : Type) (B : poset) (x y z : A -> B), fun_leq x y -> fun_leq y z -> fun_leq x z
sub_asym : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T) (x : {x : T | x \In s}) (y : {x0 : T | x0 \In s}), sub_leq x y -> sub_leq y x -> x = y
pair_limP : forall (A B : cpo) (s : chain [posetofA * B]) (x : [posetofA * B]), x \In s -> x <== pair_lim s
ideal_trans : forall (T : poset) (P : T) (x y z : ideal P), ideal_leq x y -> ideal_leq y z -> ideal_leq x z
prop_supP : forall (s : Pred Prop) (p : Prop), p \In s -> p <== prop_sup s

``` 
intros H.
apply limM.
intros y H'.
apply H.
exact H'.
